mapper.select:
SELECT per.userid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per LEFT JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_id_department d ON per.depid = d.id LEFT JOIN tb_hr_per_and_post_rs r ON per.id = r.perid
AND u.truename IN
#{param}
AND u.truename LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dimissiontruename},'%')
AND u.truename NOT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dimissiontruename},'%')
AND per.employeenumber IN
#{param}
AND per.employeenumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employeenumber}), '%')
AND per.employeenumber NOT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{employeenumber}), '%')
AND d.depname IN
#{param}
AND d.depname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{depname}), '%')
AND d.depname NOT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{depname}), '%')
AND per.id IN
#{param}
GROUP BY per.id DESC

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id WHERE per.id=#{id} and u.state = 1

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id WHERE per.id=#{id}

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id WHERE userid=#{userid}

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id WHERE per.depid=#{depid} and u.state=1

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id JOIN tb_id_manageinformation m ON per.manageinformationid = m.id
per.depid=#{depid} AND m.entrydate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND m.entrydate <= #{edate}

SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_hr_dimission d ON per.userid = d.dimissionuserid
per.depid=#{depid} AND d.lastworkingdate > #{sdate} AND d.lastworkingdate < #{edate} AND d.lastworkingdate < #{edate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_id_personalinformation ( id, userid, employeenumber, depid, sex, telphoneid, mobilephone, baseinformationid, manageinformationid, costinformationid, otherinformationid) values ( NULL , #{userid}, #{employeenumber}, #{depid}, #{sex}, #{telphoneid}, #{mobilephone}, #{baseinformationid}, #{manageinformationid}, #{costinformationid}, #{otherinformationid})
mapper.update:
update tb_id_personalinformation
employeenumber=#{employeenumber},
depid=#{depid},
sex=#{sex},
telphoneid=#{telphoneid},
mobilephone=#{mobilephone},
manageinformationid=#{manageinformationid},
costinformationid=#{costinformationid},
otherinformationid=#{otherinformationid}
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid from tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id WHERE u.state = 1 or u.state=0 ORDER BY per.id DESC
